mapper.update: UPDATE JY_BASE_RESOURCES SET name=#{name} , parentId=#{parentId}, type=#{type}, resUrl=#{resUrl}, btnId=#{btnId}, btnFun=#{btnFun}, icon=#{icon}, sort=#{sort}, isValid=#{isValid}, description=#{description}, updateTime =#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT jbm.id,jbm.name,jbm.parentId,jbm.type,jbm.resUrl,jbm.icon,jbm.sort,jbm.isValid FROM JY_BASE_RESOURCES jbm RIGHT JOIN(select jbrm.* from JY_BASE_ROLE jbr,JY_BASE_ROLE_RESOURCES jbrm WHERE jbr.id=jbrm.role_id AND jbr.isValid=1) t ON t.resources_id=jbm.id AND t.role_id IN(SELECT jba.roleId FROM JY_BASE_ACCOUNT jba WHERE jba.isValid=1 AND jba.id=#{userId}) WHERE jbm.isValid=1 AND jbm.type=1 ORDER BY jbm.parentId,jbm.sort
